name: Loco Mogul
summary: In Loco Mogul you play a seasoned railroader turned entrepreneur as you attempt to build a railroad empire. Search for hidden towns, mines and other customers in your territory then build a fully functional railroad, complete with train stations, junctions, bridges, and mountain tunnels. After you've built your railroad lines you get to run your trains and maximize profits by delivering materials to their destinations before your fuel runs out.
